text: Loved the pasta served here. Done with perfect control of the taste. Drinks are affordable, with dart machines for all enthusiasts. Wished they had chicken meat pasta options.

I was there as part of company's group team building in the late afternoon.

The team working at the time are helpful and friendly. They are attentive to our needs and cleared the tables promptly.

Unfortunately, I didn't take any photo of the place (other than the food for about 28 pax) and only had group photos which is not suitable for posting.

Had our team cohesion organised here. Mark was very kind to plan a party around our budget and was very accommodating to my request. He made special arrangements for the business to start 3 hrs earlier for us. We were very satisfied and really enjoyed our afternoon there. Will recommend if you‚Äôre looking to do your team party or cohesion here.

Was there to celebrate a friend‚Äôs birthday and staff were very friendly and helpful especially when I reached out to them to book a place in advance. We were even given a comfortable sofa seating area with a darts machine nearby.

Place had a great atmosphere and will definitely recommend anyone going to try their pizzas, me and my friends loved them! üëç
If you didn't try out their pizza, you are greatly missing out. The boss here personally does the pizza from scratch.
